name: Piano Playing
description:
A simple 2D rhythm game.

Default button control keys: A / S / D / F

~ Gameplay ~

There are 3 types of notes in the game (short, long and spam). The name of the notes speaks for itself, the peculiarity of the short note is that its length is small and you need only one press to activate it, about the long note is exactly the same - you need to hit the timing and press the key and release it after activation. Spam note is somewhat similar to the long note, it is just as long, but you need to press a certain number of times to activate it.

~ Features ~
  1. Keybind system 
  2. 3 types of notes
  3. Realtime statistics on screen.
  4. Save system.

Good luck and have fun.

There may be bugs.
